item.title: Delta Problem With Item On The Ground
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Well i wanted to duplicate an item with a different item id and everything worked properly except on the ground it looks like this.

How do i get rid of the “…” part, btw the take option still works.

Here is the code in Class8.java

if(i == 11000) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Inspect"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = -22464; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 4550; class8.anInt174 = 2654; class8.anInt181 = 580; class8.anInt198 = 60; class8.anInt190 = 152; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 6; class8.anInt194 = -1 class8.anInt165 = -1 class8.anInt200 = -1 class8.anInt188 = -1 class8.anInt164 = -1 class8.anInt175 = -1 class8.anInt197 = -1 class8.aString170 = "Key Part 1"; class8.aByteArray178 = "I wonder what I do with this.".getBytes(); }

Thanks a lot for the help ;D
